name: EoSD's Extra Stage but Recreated
description:
My contribution to the 20th anniversary of Touhou 6 - Embodiment of Scarlet Devil.

Venture back into the Scarlet Devil Mansion were Zack searches for the black magician who stole his brother's scarf.  He unknowingly encountered various enemies and was bound to encounter the Scarlet Devil's sister... Will he beat her? 

This stage contains three difficulties : Extra, Easy-Extra and Nightmare

 The two difficulties need some conditions met to play them.

Credits is in the readme.txt file
